channel.title: E-commerce on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in E-commerce on FinanClub

item.title: META
item.description: score:-42 Chances: The Federal Reserve raised interest rates at the fastest clip since the 1980s, which may affect the overall market sentiment and possibly impact the stock price of META. Spending on e-commerce and digital ads is expected to accelerate next year, which could benefit Meta Platforms and lead to potential gains in the stock.

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:-73 Chances: Shopify (SHOP) is benefiting from an expanding clientele and a robust portfolio. The e-commerce software provider is finally generating a profit. Snowflake and Shopify expect to grow revenues quickly in the coming decade, creating substantial value for shareholders. Risks: In an environment of low market interest rates, growth stocks, especially in the technology sector, such as NDVA, INTC, CRWD, META and SHOP, tend to thrive.

item.title: BABA
item.description: score:350 Chances: Alibaba Group Holding Limited stock is trading higher amid reports of China approving 105 domestic games following recent industry restrictions, indicating a potential easing pressure on the company The growth-stock-driven Nasdaq Composite remains 8% below its all-time high, which means bargains still abound for opportunistic investors Shares of tech conglomerate Tencent were down more than 12% Friday morning amid an $80 billion market selloff in Chinese gaming stocks, sparked by new, unexpected restrictions from Beijing Risks: After dropping 18% in 2023, Alibabaâ€™s U.
